com.worklight.wlclient.api

Enum WLErrorCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<WLErrorCode>
      • com.worklight.wlclient.api.WLErrorCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WLErrorCode>

    public enum WLErrorCode
extends java.lang.Enum<WLErrorCode>
    An enumeration of error messages that arrive from the MobileFirst Platform Server.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      APPLICATION_NOT_REGISTERED
      This error is returned when the client tries to set/get client details from the server before the client is registered on the MobileFirst server.
      AUTHORIZATION_FAILURE
      This error is returned due to o-auth process failure, when the client tries to obtain an access token or tries to access a resource from the server.
      CHALLENGE_HANDLING_CANCELED
      This error is returned when a challenge is cancelled midway by invoking an api BaseChallengeHandler.cancel().
      ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT_EXCEPTION
      This error is returned to indicate that a method has been passed with an illegal or inappropriate argument.
      LOGIN_ALREADY_IN_PROCESS
      This error is returned during the client registration when an attempt is made to login and there is an authorization process to login already in progress.
      LOGOUT_ALREADY_IN_PROCESS
      This error is returned when an attempt is made to logout and there is an authorization process to logout already in progress.
      MINIMUM_SERVER
      This error is returned when the MFP server version is older than 8.0.0.0-IF201701250919 and the client sdk version is the higher than 8.0.0.0-IF201701250919.
      MISSING_CHALLENGE_HANDLER
      This error is returned when the challenge handler is not registered.
      REQUEST_TIMEOUT
      This error is returned when the client tries to connect to the MobileFirst server but the request gets timed out.
      SERVER_ERROR
      This is the default server error.
      UNEXPECTED_ERROR
      This error is returned when the server is reachable but the client does not receive a valid response from the server.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • UNEXPECTED_ERROR

        public static final WLErrorCode UNEXPECTED_ERROR
        This error is returned when the server is reachable but the client does not receive a valid response from the server. Use WLFailResponse.getErrorMsg to get more information about the error.

      • REQUEST_TIMEOUT

        public static final WLErrorCode REQUEST_TIMEOUT
        This error is returned when the client tries to connect to the MobileFirst server but the request gets timed out. eg:1.When timeout is set in WLResourceRequest WLResourceRequest and there is a delay in adapter response that is more than timeout value. 2.If the server is not accessible on the IP address/port specified in mfpclient.properties file.

      • AUTHORIZATION_FAILURE

        public static final WLErrorCode AUTHORIZATION_FAILURE
        This error is returned due to o-auth process failure, when the client tries to obtain an access token or tries to access a resource from the server.

      • CHALLENGE_HANDLING_CANCELED

        public static final WLErrorCode CHALLENGE_HANDLING_CANCELED
        This error is returned when a challenge is cancelled midway by invoking an api BaseChallengeHandler.cancel(). Refer BaseChallengeHandler.cancel()

      • MISSING_CHALLENGE_HANDLER

        public static final WLErrorCode MISSING_CHALLENGE_HANDLER
        This error is returned when the challenge handler is not registered. To fix this error ,register the challenge handler using an api WLClient.registerChallengeHandler(challengeHandlerName). WLClient.registerChallengeHandler

      • ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT_EXCEPTION

        public static final WLErrorCode ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT_EXCEPTION
        This error is returned to indicate that a method has been passed with an illegal or inappropriate argument. Use WLFailResponse.getErrorMsg to get more information about the error.

      • LOGIN_ALREADY_IN_PROCESS

        public static final WLErrorCode LOGIN_ALREADY_IN_PROCESS
        This error is returned during the client registration when an attempt is made to login and there is an authorization process to login already in progress. eg:Multiple login attempts before receiving the response from the server.

      • LOGOUT_ALREADY_IN_PROCESS

        public static final WLErrorCode LOGOUT_ALREADY_IN_PROCESS
        This error is returned when an attempt is made to logout and there is an authorization process to logout already in progress.

      • APPLICATION_NOT_REGISTERED

        public static final WLErrorCode APPLICATION_NOT_REGISTERED
        This error is returned when the client tries to set/get client details from the server before the client is registered on the MobileFirst server. To resolve this error register the client using either MobileFirst CLI or Mobilefirst console.

      • SERVER_ERROR

        public static final WLErrorCode SERVER_ERROR
        This is the default server error. This error is returned when the request to the MobileFirst server fails. Use WLFailResponse.getErrorMsg to get more information about the error.

      • MINIMUM_SERVER

        public static final WLErrorCode MINIMUM_SERVER
        This error is returned when the MFP server version is older than 8.0.0.0-IF201701250919 and the client sdk version is the higher than 8.0.0.0-IF201701250919. To fix this error upgrade the server to 8.0.0.0-IF201701250919 or later version .
